item.title: Twitter my recommendation don’t Auto Follow
item.description: Twitter for business marketing is a love or hate tool – and I love to love Twitter. Auto Follow and Auto DM are two topics that with a passion, divides Social Media Marketers. I recently trialled Auto-Followafter I was told that I was distant for not doing so. Results Prove Dont Auto Follow I have not Auto-Followed Twitterers for some time – as I try to focus on building some relationship (!
